Title: The Legend of Tomiris
Actors: Almira Tursyn, Adil Akhmetov, Erkebulan Dairov, Berik Aytzhanov
Plot: This is the story of the life of the great queen of of the steppe - legendary Tomiris. She is destined to become a skillful warrior, survive the loss of close people and unite the Scythian/Saka tribes under her authority.
